content: In an attempt to avoid a Liz Truss-style market meltdown, the Chancellor promised at the outset of the Labour Government that public finances would be in balance or surplus by 2030.

title: Invading hoard of octopuses from the Mediterranean devour shellfish caught by British fishing crews - leaving shortages at restaurants
content: Shellfish wholesalers say the huge influx has resulted in swingeing cuts to restaurant orders, leaving chefs scrambling to keep their kitchens stocked.

title: Post Office hero Alan Bates attacks 'quasi kangaroo courts' payouts system and reveals 'take it or leave it' offer he's been handed
content: More than 900 sub-postmasters were prosecuted between 1999 and 2015 after faulty accounting software made it look as though money was missing from their accounts.

title: Wynne Evans breaks silence on 'spit roast' comment as he reveals 'heartbreak' over scandals that left his career in tatters - but claims he was 'forced' to apologise
content: Wynne Evans known for the Go Compare ads - denied it was a sexual jibe about a female presenter as he lifted the lid on the incident in an explosive new interview.

title: Angela Rayner wages war on developers who fail to deliver on promised homes under 'radical' housing overhaul
content: The Deputy Prime Minister plans to give councils powers to seize land from unsatisfactory housebuilders who leave vital development sites unfinished.

title: Nigel Farage's plot to win over the lefties: Reform leader to 'commit to restoring winter fuel payments and scrapping two-child benefit cap'
content: The Reform leader is expected to announce his new promises in a speech next week in a speech where he will also accuse the PM as 'one of the most unpatriotic prime ministers in our history.

title: Grieving family of girl, 11, who drowned at waterpark which had no signs warning of deep water say they never received an apology - after coroner ruled she was unlawfully killed
content: Kyra Hill got into difficulty in a designated swimming area at Liquid Leisure near Windsor, Berkshire, on August 6 2022 while enjoying a birthday party.

title: Divers make incredible discovery in hunt for missing submarine that has a haunting history
content: Scientists have made an incredible discovery on the ocean floor near California during a mission to locate a US Navy submarine that sank over 100 years ago during a training exercise off the coast.

title: National Crime Agency obtains asset-freezing order to stop future sale of home belonging to mother of ex-City Minister Tulip Siddiq
content: The agency - hailed as Britain's FBI - last night confirmed obtaining an asset-freezing order on the property in Golders Green, North London , which has been the Siddiq clan's main home for 14 years.

title: New once-a-month jab can eliminate distressing symptoms for patients with severe bowel diseases like Crohn's and ulcerative colitis in only three months
content: The medicine binds to immune cells that cause this damage, significantly reducing symptoms.

title: Defence chiefs spent more than £200million of taxpayers' money on travel and luxury stays - while troops lived in squalid conditions
content: Defence chiefs spent more than £200 million of taxpayers' money on travel and luxury stays for senior staff last year while troops lived in squalid conditions.

title: Archaeologists make chilling discovery inside 'Blood Cave' used for ancient Mayan rituals
content: Hundreds of human bones found in an underground cave in Guatemala suggest chilling human sacrifices took place there.

title: MAIL ON SUNDAY COMMENT: Labour's in a mess of its own making... now the rebels are gathering
content: This is a Government in a mess. It has failed on its own terms, and it has failed in the eyes of the electorate.

title: The Titan submersible was DOOMED from its first dive: Revealed in forensic and horrifying detail, the shocking catalogue of neglect and criminal oversight that left victims trapped in a 'death tube'
content: In June 2023, four men and a teenager climbed into the Titan submersible, a mini submarine, to descend thousands of feet through the North Atlantic until they reached the wreck of the Titanic.

title: Eight minute scan could replace painful spinal taps to diagnose multiple sclerosis
content: When Morven Lean visited her GP for a contraceptive pill check-up aged 24 in 2015, days before she was due to go travelling in South America, the last thing she expected was a hospital stay.

title: Duran Duran singer Simon Le Bon, 66, enjoys a dip in the ocean alongside his swimsuit-clad wife Yasmin during luxurious holiday in France
content: Simon Le Bon and his wife Yasmin looked blissfully happy as they took a refreshing dip in the ocean during their French getaway on Friday.

title: Chance meeting between two epidemiologists on the number 18 bus in London helped save an estimated one million lives during Covid and paved the way for the end of the pandemic
content: What Britain has to offer to the world was never clearer than in the leading role we took in the Covid crisis - and all because of a chance meeting on a number 18 bus in London .

title: ALEXANDRA SHULMAN'S NOTEBOOK: Will I ever find luggage that I can hold on to?
content: ALEXANDRA SHULMAN: Despite years of obsessive searching, I'm yet to find the perfect suitcase. It's as elusive as a desert mirage.

title: Helen Flanagan 'splits from boyfriend Robbie Talbot after just a year of dating - weeks after revealing he'd moved out of her home'

title: I'm an American living in the UK - this common household appliance terrified me when I first moved here and I thought I was going to get electrocuted
content: Maxine, an American who has been living in the UK, took to her TikTok @yorkshireyank to explain some of the British household appliances that she found confusing after moving from the states.

title: Britain's Got Talent hit by 'fix' row as fans spot a key problem with couple's 'surprise' engagement in magician Harry Moulding's Golden Buzzer performance
content: Britain's Got Talent has been hit by yet another 'fix' claim after a TikTok couple got engaged during magician Harry Moulding's emotional Golden Buzzer performance.

title: FLOURISHING AFTER 50: My daughter has asked me to retire early to help look after her two children and I don't really want to. What should I do?
content: This week, leading money educator Vanessa Stoykov helps a 59-year-old woman grapple with a dilemma many grandparents are facing.

title: New Jersey fireman who sensationally used 40th birthday party to confront 'cheater' wife reveals next move
content: Nick Galante, a New Jersey firefighter who ambushed his wife, Samantha Egues, accusing her of cheating while at his own birthday celebration, has revealed the couple's next move.

title: British woman, 23, is arrested 'after being caught trying to smuggle 18 kilos of cannabis out of Ghana and into Britain on British Airways'
content: Ghana's Narcotic Control Commission (NACOC) claimed that the young Brit had hidden 32 slabs of substances initially suspected to be a narcotic drug in two suitcases destined for London.

title: Horror as Israeli strike kills NINE of Palestinian doctor's 10 children amid renewed military offensive in Gaza
content: According to the region's civil defence agency, the strike in the southern city of Khan Yunis killed nine children belonging to a pair of married doctors.

title: I thought I had the perfect marriage until I found my husband's secret journals. My blood ran cold, I was about to vomit...
content: Ute Heggen considers herself a widow now after a moment that tore her life to pieces. And it soon got worse...

title: Lib Dem accused of abuse of power over 'I want you' texts to translator on Ukraine visit
content: The Tewkesbury MP sent intimate WhatsApp messages to the woman who had been tasked with working with the delegation of MPs in February while they were on a visit to Ukraine.

title: Hidden city built 140,000 years ago discovered at bottom of ocean
content: Buried beneath the sea off the coast of Indonesia, scientists have made a groundbreaking discovery that could rewrite the story of human origins.

title: Former MTV star and actress looks unrecognizable during a rare outing in LA... can YOU guess who it is?
content: A former MTV star and actress looked nearly unrecognizable while enjoying a rare solo outing in Los Angeles this week.

title: Blundering Home Office allowed convicted drug dealer to stay in the UK after wrongly accepting he had lived in Britain most of his life
content: Olajiire Obafemi Shoyombo, a Nigerian national, was jailed for three years and four months in prison in 2023 after being convicted of supplying of heroin and crack cocaine.

title: They look like ordinary bales of hay but cops make a VERY surprising discovery during traffic stop
content: Cops have made a shocking discovery in what appeared like ordinary bales of hay during a traffic stop.

title: The end of Rachel Reeves: Furious Labour insiders tell me there's 'blood in the water', she's about to hike taxes AGAIN and reveal her pathetic new tactic: DAN HODGES
content: They were the words that destroyed John Major's premiership and government, consigned the Tory Party to decades in the political wilderness and changed the course of British history.

title: Beloved historical cinema in UK staycation hotspot announces epic comeback after previously closing due to 'lack of footfall'
content: The Royalty Cinema in Bowness-on-Windermere in the Lake District shut its doors last August from a lack of footfall.

title: Boris Johnson becomes a dad again as wife Carrie announces arrival of her fourth child with former Prime Minister and says new daughter Poppy is 'final gang member
content: Mrs Johnson, 37, said they are 'totally smitten' with their new baby girl whom they have named Poppy Eliza Josephine Johnson. She was born on Wednesday at University College London Hospital

title: Inside story of Corbie Walpole, who doused her friend Jake Loader with petrol and set him on fire because of an insulting comment: Chain of events that led to disastrous moment
content: Corbie Walpole and Jake Loader had been friends since their school days at St Paul's College near Albury but lost control when he 'antagonised' her during a booze and drug-fuelled reunion.

title: Therapy convinced me to leave my loving husband and find someone 'better'. I soon realised the terrifying truth about dating in my 50s
content: Just two years earlier, Suzie de Jonge's marriage had been solid. She loved her husband Stuart, had a beautiful daughter, and they lived together in a charming home. Therapy changed everything.

title: Iconic '80s sexpot starlet who rose to fame on Three's Company and Dallas looks unrecognizable while out in LA
content: The retired soap star, now 66 years old, put on a casual display and had her platinum blonde hair pulled back into a messy bun while working on her animal rescue ranch on Monday.

title: Countess of Yarmouth reveals she's worried about paying children's private school fees after her husband's parents cut him off from £85m estate - and claims he gets up at 4am to work

title: The six male celebs you didn't know were ripped... but can YOU guess who they are?
content: These hunky men, who are all above the age of 40, all have one thing in common - a very ripped physique... But can YOU guess who they are?

title: We built a wheelchair ramp without planning permission and the council wants us to tear it down - it will cost us £20k
content: East Riding of Yorkshire Council has ordered the couple to reverse the modifications, claiming they were carried out without permissions and harm the appearance of the village's area.

title: ANDREW NEIL: In 55 years of covering politics, I've never accused any UK government of routinely telling untruths. But Starmer & Co have taken lying and gaslighting to a deplorable level
content: How can you tell when politicians are lying? Their lips are moving. It's a hoary old joke but it can still be guaranteed to raise a rueful chuckle among British voters disillusioned with the political process.

title: My mother was a genius yet she made my childhood hell. Why do many women my age have the same story of 'brilliant' parents who could only make us miserable?
content: In many ways, Susan Gold's mum was a brilliant parent who was warm, creative, and kind. But Susan was always living on a knife edge, waiting for her to 'flip out'.

title: It's the most common problem that ends middle-aged marriages: The woman goes off sex. Now, as a desperate husband writes to me of his despair, here's my surprising answer: CAROLINE WEST-MEADS
content: Our relationships counsellor answers your problems.
